name: A Rare Find
description:
A Rare Find is a short, free game about two cats who are always hungry for cheeseburgers and adventure.

You play as Peebs the cat, who lives in Poppy Town with his best friend Eddie. Your neighbor has asked you to deliver a lunch to Grandpa, but he's mysteriously gone missing. It's up to Peebs and Eddie to find him!

Talk to everyone and everything you see. Take your time and have fun!  💛
